DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Parents receive Parent Education Thru Simulation-Diabetes ( PETS-D ) significantly high diabetes knowledge ( cognitive visual schema ) , good technical problem-solving competence confidence , low fear stress/anxiety level ; provide good diabetes management 14 week compare parent receive standard diabetes education .
DOC.criteria: parent 18 year old child newly diagnose type 1 diabetes mellitus ( T1DM ) 5 year old 13 year age exclude child developmental delay ( Down Syndrome , Autism ) steroid induce diabetes ( cancer treatment relate cystic fibrosis ) exclude parent require insulin treatment another child TIDM
